summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 2.6°C) and feels like temperature (down 1.6°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 23%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 742 m), pressure (up 7 mbar), and light levels (up 13586 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 20 miles), light levels (up 11818 lux), cloud levels (up 422 m), and outside temperature (up 2.4°C) when compared to today.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 397m to a maximum of 2140m, averaging 525.4m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 947.4m and 887.2m respectively.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, extremely heavy humidity levels and winds should remain light. A few light raindrops may fall, the sky will be mostly cloudy (or even foggy) with low clouds, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Changeable conditions.
